style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);                    
@-moz-document domain("helmholtzschule.de") {                       

    #article-sidebar > UL,                                       
    column                                                       
    {display: none  !important;}                                 
                                                                 
    #recent-featured-title,                                      
    subheading, notched                                          
    {display: none  !important;}                                                                                              
                                                                 
    #article-guts > DIV,                                         
    article-content, clearfix                                    
    {width: 150%  !important;}                                   
                                                                 
    #content > ARTICLE > HEADER > H1,                            
    heading                                                      
    {width: 150%  !important;}                                   
                                                                     
    #content > ARTICLE > HEADER > H2,                            
    standalone-deck                                              
    {width: 150%  !important;}                                   
                                                                     
                                                                 
    #article-guts > DIV *,                                       
    article-content, clearfix, .heading, .standalone-deck        
    {background: white  !important;}
}
